Text.Page:
One of our better hunters is guiding a Mysterium team in {@Rgn:50001$$Granarkus}.

They want someone to clear trails for them. I suggested you.

Still standing, ?

Well, you're just the I wanted, assuming you're up for some excitement today."Always!"

Never any dross in you, eh?

Argons have massed right where the Mysterium wanted to go grubbing for artifacts.

Go clear a trail and collect some hides for me.

Fast little creatures, aren't they?

Beautiful, in their own way.

The prowlers are pack hunters.

Not too smart, but they can run.

Crazy, aren't they?

Those bugs they carry make good trophies.
Gatherers look strange and tricky. Expect the unexpected.

Deftly done.

I imagine you see a lot of kalashes on the front lines.

Kalashes are smart, tough, and have a long reach with their swords.

Respect those blades.
